text: do you have roasted garlic on hand I
know I just showed you how to make a
whole bunch so I bet you have some in
your fridge let me show you a couple of
ways that I like to use up my roasted
garlic the first of which is just to add
some to your salad dressing I have a
premade salad dressing just mush up a
little bit of garlic and then add it
into your red wine vinaigrette a
tablespoon for a half a cup of salad
dressing and then mix it around push it
in there it is really nice adds a little
bit of depth of flavor I'd use this on
partier salads like romaine or escarole
or something like that that's that now
I'll show you how to make roasted garlic
mashed potatoes these potatoes are
cooked drain them make sure they're nice
and dry these are kind of interesting
they use half and half one cup of
half-and-half for three pounds of
potatoes if you wanted to use buttermilk
instead of the half-and-half they would
be very good and it would be a lot lower
in fat that can go in four tablespoons
of butter add your butter potato masher
the bigger the better when it comes to a
potato masher and two head of that
roasted garlic which I already squeezed
out salt pepper just keep mashing and
mashing and mashing until there the
texture that you want taste them to make
sure they're delicious enough for you I
guarantee they will be one last thing a
delicious crostini smear a little bit of
this roasted garlic on just a tiny bit
so this is good for pretty much any
topping but I'm gonna put a little bit
of tomato on there and a little bit of
Parmesan cheese just for a couple of
them because I feel like it and it's
fresh and delicious spoon it on top
gonna be a tasty morsel I tell ya some
salt and then some delicious parmesan
why not
a crostini a delicious salad dressing
and roasted garlic mashed potatoes three
great ideas for roasted garlic but the
ideas are endless just let your
imagination go wild
